summary: A test suite that validates the Flax implementation of the ResNet architecture, checking configuration defaults, forward‑pass signatures, hidden‑state outputs, input embeddings, just‑in‑time compilation compatibility, and core model attributes for image classification tasks.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and performance of the Flax ResNet model before it is released or integrated into production pipelines, reducing risk and ensuring reliable image‑classification results.
